full_summary:
**Phase I - General Contracting Services for the High Commission of Canada in Australia**
--------------------------------------------------------

### Tender Announcement

**Reference Number:** WS4583715675 - Doc 4601048261
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** June 26, 2024
**Tender Closing Date:** August 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of the Department of Foreign Affairs, Trade and Development Canada (DFATD), invites bidders to prequalify for construction services for The High Commission of Canada in Australia, in Canberra.

### Required Services

* Building and Facility Construction and Maintenance Services
* Multiple Unit Dwelling Construction Services
* Specialized Public Building Construction Services
* Specialized Trade Construction and Maintenance Services

### Tender Requirements

* Respondents must meet the prequalification requirements as defined in this document
* Only those Respondents considered by PWGSC to meet the prequalification requirements will be invited to submit competitive bids for this work during the Invitation to Tender (ITT) phase (Phase II) of the solicitation
* Work is to be completed within 100 weeks from contract award

### Contact Information

* Name: Amanda Tenbult (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [amanda.tenbult@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:amanda.tenbult@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Phone: Not available

### Notice URL

* https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/20136828?extsite=MjAxMzY4MjhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

### Timing

* Closing time for bid submissions: August 7, 2024, 2:00 PM EST
* Only bids submitted before the stated time will be considered responsive

### Trade Agreements

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Peru Free Trade
